attributes.action: Petition to make child sex offences mandatory life sentence. NO EXCEPTIONS
attributes.additional_details: Because the laws and the those charged with implementing them laws and flagrantly being misused by the very people empowered to enforce them.
attributes.background: Make all crimes against a minor wether physical,mental,or financially motivated a mandatory life sentence. NO EXCEPTION

rejection.details: The first paragraph doesn't mention sexual offences and also talks about financially motivated crimes whereas the title suggests that the petition is about sexual offences. The second paragraph is also unclear
